text: What are you doing? Take your hand off~~

Sob sob QAQ, see you later...

Hmph, you’ll regret it!

seasons.text: New Year’s Day is here, a new year has begun. This year is {year}~
It’s Valentine’s Day again. Did you find someone in {year}~
Today is Arbor Day, protect the environment!
Let me tell you a secret~ Today is April Fool’s Day, don’t get fooled~
Today is Labor Day, have you planned where to go for the holiday~
It’s Children’s Day, happy times are always short. If only we could stay young forever...
Victory Day of the Chinese People’s War of Resistance Against Japan, remember history, honor the martyrs, cherish peace, and create the future.
Teacher’s Day, say hello to your teachers at school~
National Day is here, celebrate the motherland’s birthday!
Who did you spend this year’s Double Eleven with~
These days are Christmas, the master must be shopping again~

time.text: Good morning! The early bird catches the worm, a beautiful day is about to begin~
Good morning! Is work going well? Don’t sit too long, get up and move around!
It’s noon, you’ve been working all morning, now it’s lunch time!
It’s easy to feel sleepy in the afternoon, have you completed your exercise goal for today?
It’s evening! The sunset outside is beautiful, nothing beats the beauty of a sunset~
Good evening, how was your day?

text: It’s already so late, go to bed early, good night~
Take care of your eyes during late nights!

time.text: Are you a night owl? It’s so late, can you wake up tomorrow?

default: Long time no see, time flies...
You big meanie! It’s been so long since you last talked to me, sob sob~
I’ll punch you with my little fists!
Remember to add my home to your favorites!
